title: Jaguar Land Rover Q3: Tata Motor's luxury arm achieves highest wholesales in 11 quarters; order book declines
description: On Monday, Jaguar Land Rover, owned by Tata Motors, announced a 27% surge in total wholesales, reaching 101,043 units in the third quarter ending on December 31, 2023, compared to the same period last year. According to Tata Motors' stock filing, this quarter marked the highest wholesales for Jaguar Land Rover in the past 11 quarters.
